## RFAP Consultant Services - Upgrade Intrusion Alarm System

### Contract Details

* **Reference Number**: MX-22694649954
* **Solicitation Number**: HX700806
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-01
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-04-14T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start and End Date**: 2024-08-17 to 2024-08-17
* **Procurement Category**: Services (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Tender Description

Defence Construction Canada is inviting Abbreviated Proposals from engineering consulting firms to provide professional services for the upgrade of the Intrusion Alarm System at Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) Halifax and satellite MARLANT locations in Nova Scotia. The services include:

* Assessment and investigation of the existing system
* Review of supporting reference documents
* Preparation of a Statement of Requirement and Concept
* Design development, construction documents, and assistance during the tender call and construction phases

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Francis Bélanger
* **Contact Email**: francis.belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 418-559-2804

### Accessing Tender Documents and Submitting Proposals

Tender documents and the Electronic Bidding System are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Fees may apply; see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the RFAP documents. The objective is to select the proponent with the highest total score.

### Security Requirements

The Security Requirements for this project are identified in the RFAP Documents.
